snippet: The American Music Project is the brainchild of Lawrence A. Johnson, a music critic who got tired of complaining that groups were not performing enough American music.
abstract: The American Music Project is the brainchild of Lawrence A. Johnson, a music critic who got tired of complaining that groups were not performing enough American music.

headline.main: New Foundation Will Support, and Commission, American Music
